subject: Soccer
Stadiums and Arenas
lead_paragraph: David Beckham’s bid for a Major League Soccer team had a setback when the city of Miami rejected his plan to build a downtown waterfront stadium on a site next to the Miami Heat basketball arena.
snippet: David Beckham’s bid for a Major League Soccer team had a setback when the city of Miami rejected his plan to build a downtown waterfront stadium on a site next to the Miami Heat basketball arena.
